project.name: ClickUp MCP Server
project.description: A Remote MCP Server hosted on CloudFlare Workers that enables AI agents to securely interact with ClickUp workspaces through OAuth authentication. Provides 72+ tools across 12 categories for comprehensive task management, time tracking, and workspace operations.

epics.name: Documentation Alignment
epics.description: Complete documentation overhaul to reflect the remote SaaS architecture instead of local MCP server

tasks.name: Update CLAUDE.md - Fix tool count (72), add remote architecture, OAuth/JWT documentation
tasks.description: Fix tool count from 36 to 72, document remote MCP server architecture, add OAuth/JWT authentication details

tasks.name: Rewrite README.md - Complete overhaul for SaaS model with OAuth authentication
tasks.description: Complete rewrite to lead with SaaS value proposition, OAuth authentication instructions, remote MCP server configuration
dependencies: Update CLAUDE.md - Fix tool count (72), add remote architecture, OAuth/JWT documentation

tasks.name: Update tool documentation - Include all 72 tools with proper categories
tasks.description: Document all 72 tools across 12 categories (Task, List, Space, Custom Fields, etc.) with free/premium tier markers
dependencies: Update CLAUDE.md - Fix tool count (72), add remote architecture, OAuth/JWT documentation

tasks.name: Create authentication flow documentation - OAuth 2.0 + PKCE flow diagrams
tasks.description: Create comprehensive OAuth 2.0 + PKCE flow documentation with diagrams, JWT token management, session lifecycle

epics.name: Premium Features
epics.description: Document and implement premium tier features and billing integration

tasks.name: Document premium tier features - Feature comparison table and billing info
tasks.description: Create free vs premium comparison table, document Stripe integration, subscription management, feature limitations by tier

tasks.name: Implement Stripe webhook handling for subscriptions
tasks.description: Implement Stripe webhook handlers for subscription lifecycle events (created, updated, canceled)

tasks.name: Verify free vs premium tool enforcement
tasks.description: Test and verify that premium tools are properly restricted to paying subscribers
dependencies: Implement Stripe webhook handling for subscriptions

epics.name: Security & Compliance
epics.description: Enhance security features and ensure compliance

tasks.name: Expand security documentation - AES-256-GCM encryption, JWT session management
tasks.description: Document data encryption details, API key storage security, session management, rate limiting, audit logging, GDPR compliance

tasks.name: Document GDPR compliance notes
tasks.description: Document data privacy policies, user data handling, right to deletion, data portability
dependencies: Expand security documentation - AES-256-GCM encryption, JWT session management

tasks.name: Test multi-tenant user isolation
tasks.description: Comprehensive testing to ensure complete user data isolation in multi-tenant environment

tasks.name: Configure R2 bucket for audit logging
tasks.description: Set up CloudFlare R2 bucket for storing audit logs with proper retention policies

epics.name: API & Integration
epics.description: Update API documentation and enhance integration capabilities

tasks.name: Update API reference - Remote MCP endpoints with required headers
tasks.description: Document remote MCP endpoint structure, required authentication headers, error response codes, rate limiting headers

tasks.name: Add WebSocket support for real-time MCP connections
tasks.description: Implement WebSocket support for real-time bidirectional MCP protocol communication

tasks.name: Test OAuth flow end-to-end with ClickUp
tasks.description: Complete end-to-end testing of OAuth 2.0 + PKCE flow with ClickUp authorization
dependencies: Create authentication flow documentation - OAuth 2.0 + PKCE flow diagrams

tasks.name: Validate JWT token generation and refresh mechanisms
tasks.description: Test JWT token generation, validation, expiration, and refresh token flow
dependencies: Test OAuth flow end-to-end with ClickUp

epics.name: Developer Experience
epics.description: Improve developer onboarding and local development experience

tasks.name: Create CloudFlare Workers developer setup guides
tasks.description: Document CloudFlare Workers development setup, environment variable management, KV namespace config, R2 bucket setup, Wrangler local testing

tasks.name: Complete user onboarding documentation - End-to-end user journey
tasks.description: Create complete user journey documentation from signup to first successful API call
dependencies: Create authentication flow documentation - OAuth 2.0 + PKCE flow diagrams

tasks.name: Write migration guides - Moving from local to remote MCP server
tasks.description: Create migration guides for users transitioning from local MCP installation to remote SaaS
dependencies: Complete user onboarding documentation - End-to-end user journey

tasks.name: Create troubleshooting guides - Common issues and solutions
tasks.description: Document common issues like authentication failures, rate limiting, connection problems with solutions

tasks.name: Document ultra-think testing methodology - All 72 tools testing
tasks.description: Document the ultra-think comprehensive testing methodology that validates all 72 tools
dependencies: Update tool documentation - Include all 72 tools with proper categories

tasks.name: Update test data preparation in mcp_test_plan.md with actual IDs
tasks.description: Replace all placeholder IDs in test plan with actual workspace IDs, task IDs, list IDs from test environment

tasks.name: Create performance benchmarks for all 72 tools
tasks.description: Establish performance benchmarks and SLAs for all 72 tools under various load conditions
dependencies: Document ultra-think testing methodology - All 72 tools testing

tasks.name: Add comprehensive error handling for non-existent tasks
tasks.description: Improve error handling and user-friendly messages when tasks/lists/spaces don't exist

epics.name: Infrastructure & Operations
epics.description: CloudFlare infrastructure setup and operational procedures

tasks.name: Set up CloudFlare KV namespaces for user sessions
tasks.description: Configure CloudFlare KV namespaces for storing user sessions, API keys, and temporary data

tasks.name: Verify CloudFlare environment variables configuration
tasks.description: Validate all required environment variables are properly configured in CloudFlare Workers
dependencies: Set up CloudFlare KV namespaces for user sessions

tasks.name: Document deployment rollback procedures
tasks.description: Create detailed rollback procedures for production deployments including database migrations

tasks.name: Create workspace hierarchy caching strategy
tasks.description: Implement intelligent caching for workspace hierarchy to reduce API calls and improve performance

tasks.name: Fix TypeScript compilation errors related to missing Node types
tasks.description: Resolve TypeScript errors about missing Node type definitions and module resolution issues

tasks.name: Implement rate limiting adjustments in BaseClickUpService
tasks.description: Fine-tune rate limiting parameters in BaseClickUpService for optimal performance

tasks.name: Optimize bulk operations with concurrency utilities
tasks.description: Enhance bulk operations using processInBatches and other concurrency utilities
